Class.name: HtmlPager
Class.summary: Returns an HTML container element with data attributes that contains a list of hyperlinks and text for providing paging functionality to the giver data.

Class.name: AjaxPager
Class.summary: Returns an HTML container element with Ajax data attributes that contains a list of hyperlinks and text for providing paging functionality to the giver data.

Class.name: MvcAjaxOptions
Class.summary: Represents option settings for running Ajax scripts for the MvcPager control, this class inherits from AjaxOptions.

Class.name: PagedList
Class.summary: Represents a strongly typed list of objects that can be accessed by index and contains metadata for paging.

Class.name: PageLinqExtensions
Class.summary: This class contains two ToPagedList extension methods which return a strongly typed PagedList<T> object, one for IQueryable<T> and one for IEnumerable<T>

Class.name: PagerOptionsBuilder
Class.summary: Represents a PagerOptions builder that is used to create the PagerOptions object.

Class.name: ScriptResourceExtensions
Class.summary: This class contains two extension methods: HtmlHelper.RegisterMvcPagerScriptResource method is used to register the MvcPager jQuery plugin, and AjaxHelper.LoadMvcPagerScript method is used to dynamically load the MvcPager jQuery plugin, two methods can not be used at the same time.

Class.name: PagerExtensions
Class.summary: Represents support for HtmlPager and AjaxPager in an application.

Class.name: MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder
Class.summary: Represents a MvcAjaxOptions builder that is used to create the MvcAjaxOptions object.

Class.name: DisplayNameExtensions
Class.summary: Provides a mechanism to get display names for the generic IPagedList<T> and PagedList<T> models.

Interface.name: IPagedList
Interface.summary: Defines members that an object must implement in order to have paging functionality provided by the MvcPager control.

Interface.name: IPagedList2
Interface.summary: Defines members that an object must implement in order to have paging functionality provided by the MvcPager control.

Constructor.name: HtmlPager1
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of HtmlPager class with the specified HtmlHelper instance, total item count, page size, current page index and the PagerOptions instance.
Constructor.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Total number of data items.
Page size.
Current page index.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.

Constructor.name: HtmlPager2
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of HtmlPager class with the specified HtmlHelper instance, total item count, page size and current page index.
Constructor.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Total number of data items.
Current page index.
Current page index.

Constructor.name: HtmlPager3
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of HtmlPager class with the specified HtmlHelper instance, data object that implements the IPagedList interface and the PagerOptions instance.
Constructor.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.

Constructor.name: HtmlPager4
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of HtmlPager class with the specified HtmlHelper instance and data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
Constructor.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.

Constructor.name: AjaxPager1
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of AjaxPager class with the specified AjaxHelper instance, total item count, page size, current page index, PagerOptions and MvcAjaxOptions instances.
Constructor.param: The AJAX helper instance that this method extends.
Total number of data items.
Page size.
Current page index.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.
A MvcAjaxOptions object that provides options for the asynchronous request.

Constructor.name: AjaxPager2
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of AjaxPager class with the specified AjaxHelper instance, data object that implements the IPagedList interface, PagerOptions and MvcAjaxOptions instances.
Constructor.param: The AJAX helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.
A MvcAjaxOptions object that provides options for the asynchronous request.

Method.name: Options
Method.summary: Method used to create PagerOptions object.

Method.name: AjaxOptions
Method.summary: Method used to create MvcAjaxOptions object.

Method.name: ToHtmlString
Method.summary: Renders AjaxPager to HTML encoded string for display on the page.

Constructor.name: PagerOptions
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PagerOptions class with default property values.

Property.name: ActionName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the action method.

Property.name: ControllerName
Property.summary: The name of the controller class.

Property.name: RouteName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the name of the route that is used to generate paging urls.

Property.name: RouteValues
Property.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains the parameters for the route used by MvcPager.

Property.name: HtmlAttributes
Property.summary: Gets or sets the object that contains the HTML attributes to set for the MvcPager.

Property.name: FirstPageRouteName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the route name for the generation of the first page url.

Property.name: AutoHide
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether MvcPager should be hidden if there's only one page of data.

Property.name: PageIndexOutOfRangeErrorMessage
Property.summary: Gets or sets the error message to be displayed when page index is oute of range (less than 1 or larger than total pages count).

Property.name: InvalidPageIndexErrorMessage
Property.summary: Gets or sets the error message to be displayed when page index is invalid (not a valid integer).

Property.name: PageIndexParameterName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the page index parameter name in the current route.

Property.name: PageIndexBoxId
Property.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the page index box (must be textbox or dropdownlist).

Property.name: MaximumPageIndexItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of page indices to be displayed within page index dropdownlist, this property value has no effect if page index box is a textbox,

Property.name: GoToButtonId
Property.summary: Gets or sets the id value of the go to button for the page index box, if this property value is not set, pagechanged event will be fired after value of the pager index box is changed(fired by javascript onchange event).

Property.name: PageNumberFormatString
Property.summary: Gets or sets the format string for all numeric pager items.

Property.name: CurrentPageNumberFormatString
Property.summary: Gets or sets the format string for the current page number.

Property.name: ContainerTagName
Property.summary: Gets or sets the HTML tag name for the container element of the pager.

Property.name: PagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to all pager items.

Property.name: OnPageIndexError
Property.summary: Gets or sets the Javascript function to call when page index errors occured.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template for the numeric pager items.

Property.name: CurrentPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the current page pager item.

Property.name: NavigationPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the first, previous, next and last page pager items.

Property.name: MorePagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the more pager items.

Property.name: DisabledPagerItemTemplate
Property.summary: Gets or sets the html template to be applied to the disabled pager items.

Property.name: AlwaysShowFirstLastPageNumber
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first and the last numeric pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: NumericPagerItemCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of the numeric pager items to be displayed.

Property.name: ShowPrevNext
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the previous page and the next page pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: PrevPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the previous page pager item.

Property.name: ShowFirstLast
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first and last paging buttons are displayed.

Property.name: NextPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the next page pager item.

Property.name: ShowNumericPagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the numeric pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: ShowFirstLast
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first page and the last page pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: FirstPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the first page button.

Property.name: LastPageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the last page pager item.

Property.name: ShowMorePagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the more pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: MorePageText
Property.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed for the more pager items.

Property.name: Id
Property.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the top DOM element that is the container of all pager items.

Property.name: HorizontalAlign
Property.summary: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of a MvcPager on the page.

Property.name: CssClass
Property.summary: Gets or sets the css class to be applied to container element of the pager.

Property.name: ShowDisabledPagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the disabled pager items should be displayed.

Property.name: MaximumPageNumber
Property.summary: Gets or sets the maximum page number limitation, default value is 0, which means maximum page number is calculated from the data to be paged.

Property.name: HidePagerItems
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether MvcPager should be hidden (in case you need to create your own pager UI).

Property.name: NavigationPagerItemsPosition
Property.summary: Gets or sets the position of the first, previous, next and last pager items.

Property.name: EnablePartialLoading
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether partial page loading is enabled.

Property.name: DataFormId
Property.summary: Gets or sets the ID of the form element that values of fields should be passed to server by MvcPager every time page changed.

Property.name: AllowCache
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client cache is allowed.

Property.name: EnableHistorySupport
Property.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating browser history support is enabled by adding hash(#) to url.

Enum.name: PagerItemsPosition
Enum.summary: Specifies the position of the first, previous, next and last navigation buttons within MvcPager.

Method.name: HtmlPager1
Method.summary: Returns an HtmlPager object with total item count, page size, current page index and the PagerOptions instance.
Method.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Total number of data items.
Page size.
Current page index.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.

Method.name: HtmlPager2
Method.summary: Returns an HtmlPager object with total item count, page size and current page index.
Method.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Total number of data items.
Page size.
Current page index.

Method.name: HtmlPager3
Method.summary: Returns an HtmlPager object with the data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
Method.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.

Method.name: HtmlPager4
Method.summary: Returns an HtmlPager object with the data object that implements the IPagedList interface and the PagerOptions instance.
Method.param: The HTML helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.

Method.name: AjaxPager1
Method.summary: Returns an AjaxPager object with total item count, page size, current page index, PagerOptions and MvcAjaxOptions instances.
Method.param: The AJAX helper instance that this method extends.
Total number of data items.
Page size.
Current page index.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.
A MvcAjaxOptions object that provides options for the asynchronous request.

Method.name: AjaxPager2
Method.summary: Returns an AjaxPager object with the data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
Method.param: The AJAX helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.

Method.name: AjaxPager3
Method.summary: Returns an AjaxPager object with the data object that implements the IPagedList interface and the PagerOptions instance.
Method.param: The AJAX helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.

Method.name: AjaxPager4
Method.summary: Returns an AjaxPager object with the data object that implements the IPagedList interface, PagerOptions and MvcAjaxOptions instances.
Method.param: The AJAX helper instance that this method extends.
Data object that implements the IPagedList interface.
A PagerOptions object that provides options for the pagination settings.
A MvcAjaxOptions object that provides options for the asynchronous request.

Method.name: LoadMvcPagerScript
Method.summary: 通过Ajax动态加载并运行MvcPager客户端jQuery插件
Method.param: 此方法扩展的 AjaxHelper 实例

Method.name: RegisterMvcPagerScriptResource
Method.summary: 注册MvcPager客户端jQuery插件
Method.param: 此方法扩展的 HtmlHelper 实例

Constructor.name: PagedList1
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PagedList class using the data to be paged, current page index and page size.
Constructor.param: All items to be paged
Current page index
Page size

Constructor.name: PagedList2
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PagedList class using current page items, current page index, page size and the total item count.
Constructor.param: Object that contains data to be displayed on page, should implements IEnumerable<T> interface;
Current page index
Page size
The total number of records that are available for paging

Constructor.name: PagedList3
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PagedList class using the data to be paged, current page index and page size.
Constructor.param: All items to be paged
Current page index
Page size

Constructor.name: PagedList4
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PagedList class using current page items, current page index, page size and the total item count.
Constructor.param: Object that contains data to be displayed on page, should implements IQueryable<T> interface
Current page index
Page size
The total number of records that are available for paging

Property.name: CurrentPageIndex
Property.summary: Gets or sets the current page index.

Property.name: PageSize
Property.summary: Gets or sets the number of data items that are displayed for each page of data.

Property.name: TotalItemCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the total number of records that are available for paging.

Property.name: TotalPageCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the total number of data items that are available for paging.

Property.name: StartItemIndex
Property.summary: Gets the index of the first data item that is displayed on a page of data.

Property.name: EndItemIndex
Property.summary: Gets the index of the last data item that is displayed on a page of data.

Property.name: CurrentPageIndex
Property.summary: Gets or sets the current page index.

Property.name: PageSize
Property.summary: Gets or sets the number of data items that are displayed for each page of data.

Property.name: TotalItemCount
Property.summary: Gets or sets the total number of data items that are available for paging.

Method.name: ToPagedList1
Method.summary: Gets a strongly typed PagedList object using all items, current page index and page size.
Method.param: A sequence of data items that implemented IQueryable interface.
Current page index.
The number of data items that are displayed for each page of data.

Method.name: ToPagedList2
Method.summary: Gets a strongly typed PagedList object using all items, current page index and page size.
Method.param: A sequence of data items that implemented IEnumerable interface.
Current page index.
The number of data items that are displayed for each page of data.

Constrctor.name: PagerOptionsBuilder
Constrctor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PagerOptionsBuilder class with a PagerOptions instance.
Constrctor.param: An PagerOptions instance contains option settings for the MvcPager control.

Method.summary: Adds an item to HtmlAttributes property of PagerOptions
Method.param: The name of the html attribute to add.
The value of the html attribute to add.

Method.name: AddRouteValue

Method.param: The key of the element to add.
The value of the element to add.

Method.summary: Sets the ShowNumericPagerItems property of PagerOptions value to false.

Method.name: HidePagerItems
Method.summary: Sets the ShowPagerItems property of PagerOptions value to false.

Method.name: HidePrevNext
Method.summary: Sets the ShowPrevNext property of PagerOptions value to false.

Method.summary: Sets the MorePageText property of PagerOptions with a given value.

Constructor.name: MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder
Constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MvcAjaxOptionsBuilder class with a MvcAjaxOptions instance.
Constructor.param: A MvcAjaxOptions instance contains option settings for running Ajax scripts for the MvcPager control.

Method.name: DisableHistorySupport
Method.summary: Disables the browser history support, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.EnableHistorySupport to false.

Method.name: DisallowCache
Method.summary: Disables the client cache, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.AllowCache to false.

Method.name: EnablePartialLoading
Method.summary: Sets a value indicating whether partial page loading is enabled, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.EnablePartialLoading to true.

Method.name: SetConfirm
Method.summary: Sets the message to display in a confirmation window before a request is submitted, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.Confirm to the given value.

Method.name: SetDataFormId
Method.summary: Sets the ID of the form element that values of fields should be passed to server by MvcPager every time page changed, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.DataFormId to the given value.

Method.name: SetHttpMethod
Method.summary: Sets the HTTP request method ("Get" or "Post"), it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.HttpMethod to the given value.

Method.name: SetLoadingElementDuration
Method.summary: Sets a value, in milliseconds, that controls the duration of the animation when showing or hiding the loading element, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.LoadingElementDuration to the given value.

Method.name: SetLoadingElementId
Method.summary: Sets the id attribute of an HTML element that is displayed while the Ajax function is loading, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.LoadingElementId to the given value.

Method.name: SetOnBegin
Method.summary: Sets the name of the JavaScript function to call immediately before the page is updated, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnBegin to the given value.

Method.name: SetOnComplete
Method.summary: Sets the JavaScript function to call when response data has been instantiated but before the page is updated, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnComplete to the given value.

Method.name: SetOnFailure
Method.summary: Sets the JavaScript function to call if the page update fails, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnFailure to the given value.

Method.name: SetOnSuccess
Method.summary: Sets the JavaScript function to call after the page is successfully updated, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.OnSuccess to the given value.

Method.name: SetUpdateTargetId
Method.summary: Sets sets the ID of the DOM element to update by using the response from the server, it's equivalent of setting MvcAjaxOptions.UpdateTargetId to the given value.

Method.name: DisplayNameFor1
Method.summary: Gets the display name for the model of type IPagedList<T>.

Method.name: DisplayNameFor2
Method.summary: Gets the display name for the model of type PagedList<T>.
